title: ninra tirukkOlam
sahitya:
ninra tirukkOlam kANIr ennappan nIlamEgha vaNNam nenjinai aLLIDa


anupallavi

  taN punal nUpura gangai pAindiDat-tiru nirai shOlai shuranda rAjan


caraNam    viNmati veyyOn kaNNiraNDuDaiyOn taNDU vil vALAzhi sangam tarittu
 maNDUka mAmunikku mOkSamaLittup-pANDiyanuDan kAlan pArkkak-kATSi koDuttu
 eddishai mAndarum cittam kaLittu metta onrAik-kUDi kaittalam kuvittiDa cittirai paurNami
 utsavam koNDu shIrum shirappuDan aruL tigazha marai pugazha jagam magizha oLir vaDivazhagan
